name: Nature Walk: Rave Edition
description:
-- I FORGOT TO INCLUE THE MODULES I USED, oops. I'll have to add those in later.-- 
Fixed that ^ Should work now

Find out what it's like to be cool.

Controls
Right: Move right
Up: Pick up item player is touching

Note: You cannot go backwards, so make sure you take the items you want.

Game made as a learning excercise, this is my first "game" with LOVE
